short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A more convenient L2 wallet for assets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description
Facilitate connection between Mainnet and L2 Networks
NOTE: This wallet currently exists for the testing purpose
The Orbiter Wallet Browser Extension allows you to:
-Create and import recovery phrase, derive private keys (Mainnet and StarkNet correspond to each other)
-Deposit from Mainnet to StarkNet
-Withdraw from StarkNet to Mainnet
-Transfer tokens
-View owned tokens
-Show recent transactions
